note:
Why is it so hard for social media to

select *
from posts
where users in (select users from follows)
order by post_date descending

?

fields.name: Politics
fields.value: Left of Democrats, right of communists. If only there were some document that declared the government was founded to promote the general Welfare.

fields.name: Religion
fields.value: If there are gods, they created a universe that doesn't care if we exist, so if anyone's going to take care of us, it's us.
